Package com.groupA.location.world

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChangeGroupActivity.ChangeGroupListener
    An interface to communicate the outcome of a change group attempt to the rest of the client
    ChangeGroupDialogFragment.ChangeGroupDialogListener
    An interface between the change group dialog and the rest of the UI
    DownloadOthersActivity.DownloadOthersListener  
    LocationManagerFragment.LocationManagerListener
    The activity that deals with the manager -- that is, MainActivity -- must implement the following functions:
    LoggingClient.ClientListener
    Interface between the logging client and the Logging Manager
    LoggingManagerFragment.LoggingManagerListener
    The activity that deals with the manager -- that is, MainActivity -- must implement the following functions:
    LoginActivity.LoginListener
    Interface for communicating the outcome of the login attempt
    LoginDialogFragment.LoginDialogListener
    The fragment that handles the outcome of this dialog -- that is, UIManagerFragment -- must contain a function for dealing with the output of this dialog (that is, the id/password combination that the user inserted)
    LogoutActivity.LogoutListener
    Interface for communicating the outcome of the logout attempt
    LogoutDialogFragment.LogoutDialogListener
    The fragment that handles the outcome of this dialog -- that is, UIManagerFragment -- must contain a function onLogoutChosen() that gets called if the user confirms that they want to log out.
    MapManagerFragment.MapManagerListener
    The activity that deals with the manager -- that is, MainActivity -- must implement the following functions:
    MessageDialogFragment.MessageDialogListener
    The fragment that handles the outcome of this dialog -- that is, UIManagerFragment -- must contain a function for dealing with the output of this dialog
    RegisterActivity.RegisterListener
    Interface for communicating the outcome of the registration attempt
    RegisterDialogFragment.RegisterDialogListener
    The fragment that handles the outcome of this dialog -- that is, UIManagerFragment -- must contain a function for dealing with the output of this dialog
    UIManagerFragment.UIListener
    Public interface for the UI to communicate with the main activity.
    UpdateLocationActivity.LocListener
    Interface for communicating the result of the attempt to send the location to the server
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Beacon
    Beacons -- animated flame-like markers that can be placed on the map.
    ChangeGroupActivity
    Contacts the server to change group.
    ChangeGroupDialogFragment
    A simple dialog to allow the user to change group.
    CreaturesManager
    Keeps track of the various players, beacons, and targets (Sharing of beacons and targets between players not yet implemented)
    DownloadOthersActivity
    Contacts the server to download the active players' positions Create a new DownloadPlayersActivity object and execute() it to do so.
    ErrorDialogFragment
    A simple dialog for displaying error messages.
    LocationManagerFragment
    Deals with contacts with Google Location Services
    LoggingClient
    Low-level login, logout and message-sending functionalities.
    LoggingManagerFragment
    Deals with logging-related functions.
    LoginActivity
    Contacts the server to attempt to login Create a new LoginActivity object and execute() it to do so.
    LoginDialogFragment
    A simple dialog asking the user for their login name and password.
    LogoutActivity
    Contacts the server to attempt to logout Create a new LogoutActivity object and execute() it to do so.
    LogoutDialogFragment
    A simple dialog asking the user if they are sure they want to log out
    MainActivity
    The main activity, called when the app is started.
    MapManagerFragment
    Loads up the map from Google Maps, displays it, moves it as required.
    MessageDialogFragment
    A simple dialog to compose and send a message to the other users of the group
    PlayerCharacter
    Keeps track of the positions and properties of the users
    RegisterActivity
    Contacts the server to attempt to register Create a new RegisterActivity object and execute() it to do so.
    RegisterDialogFragment
    A simple dialog to register a new user
    SendMessageActivity
    Contacts the server to attempt to send a message Create a new SendMessageActivity object and execute() it to do so.
    SpriteManager
    Manages the collection of the bitmaps to display for players and beacons *
    Target
    Keeps track of the positions and properties of the targets
    UIManagerFragment
    Handles interface events (such as button clicks and so on), opens dialogs if necessary.
    UpdateLocationActivity
    Contacts the server to update the location Create a new UpdateLocationActivity object and execute() it to do so.
